SENT.plain: Eight pedigrees of patients with Marfan syndrome are presented

In addition, four pedigrees of patients with conditions sometimes showing a marfanoid body habitus are described: Wagner-Stickler syndrome, multiple endocrine neoplasia type III, Ehlers-Danlos syndrome type VIA, and congenital contractural arachnodactyly type II
Emphasis is placed on the importance of genetic information in the differential diagnosis and management of patients and family members by the ophthalmologist
